Small World

THREE.js visual created by:

www.geemichael.com

To see the complete project, visit:

www.calvindong.me/map

Small World was a finalist at the 2016 LinkedIn Intern Hackfest. Featuring a THREE.js visualization of a user's connections from San Francisco, the web app proposes a new way of interacting with one's social network.
Press space to regenerate random data.
